tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IntellectualPropertyRights (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    reminder_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intellectual_property_id INT,
    reminder_date DATE,
    reminder_message VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (intellectual_property_id) REFERENCES intellectual_property_rights(id)
);

CREATE TABLE IntellectualPropertyRights (
    ipr_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ipr_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    renewable BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);
